Github Portfolio

This site!

The largest of my projects yet. A homepage combining 3D and 2D webpage elements to one site. Demonstrates my other hobbies like 3D-modeling as well.

Whisky Price Tracker

Fullstack project for LUT fullstack course. Original idea came from a request for a site checking the price and history of whiskies available in the alko site.

Android Finnkino App

App that lists Finnkino movies, and their corresponding info such as IMDB reviews, runtime and release date. Also includes some databasing functionality.

Kyykka Hauki Bot

A Telegram bot for the outdoor game kyykkä originally made for our kyykkä team. Contains database functionality in json.
